name: StoneX Group Inc.
summary: StoneX Group Inc. is a publicly traded financial services company headquartered in New York, specializing in commodities, securities, foreign exchange, OTC derivatives, and physical commodities trading. With roots dating back to 1924, StoneX provides execution, clearing, custody, risk management, and advisory services to institutional, commercial, and retail clients globally. The company operates in over 70 offices worldwide and is listed on NASDAQ under the ticker SNEX.
